v2.2.10-04

 Webster County, KY
 Bexar County, TX (alt)
 
 Location Fixes:
 Park County, CO
 Fairfield County, OH
 
 v2.2.10-03
 Added additional warning to avoid Cadpage crashes when users disregard our warning that battery optimization really needs to be disabled
 
 v2.2.10-01
 Updated to be fully compatible with Android 12.
 
 Disabling battery optimization is now mandatory under Android 12. Actually battery consumption should be unaffected.
